post.author: 이성기
post.content: ---------------------- New Services ---------------------- Get High Speed DSL ( UP to 5Mbit/s ) for only $18.95 per month. Service is currently only available in Ontario and Quebec ( Canada ). For more info please visit http://acanac.ca ( Limited Time Offer )
post.title: Acanac에서 19불짜리 인터넷을 다시 promotion하고 있습니다.
